name: Corporate Hell (Deylz)
description:
Welcome to your new job!

Explore and sabotage the various production facilities of hell itself. Help out your fellow doomed souls and earn their special abilities. As more parts of hell become accessible you come closer and closer to redemption.

Features:

  • Keyboard + Mouse & Gamepad Support
  • Exploration & Secret hunting
  • Non-Linear Progression
  • Collectible Special Abilities
  • Light Platforming
  • Easter-Eggs
  • Optional Secret Ending
